title: Hokusai: 'Thirty-six views of Mount Fuji'
brief_description: The narration in the film gives detailed information on the life and work of Hokusai. The film explores his “Thirty-six Views of Mt Fuji” and his art showing the life of the common man. Also outlines the history of modern Japanese art. Suitable for upper secondary level.
